text: @IanSams Biden will probably say he'll fight this Wuhan Virus guy, whoever he is, and threaten to bring his bud Corn Pop along too. I can hear him now, "Virus, smyrus, that's just a bunch of malarky. I'll take that dog faced pony boy out back and teach him a lesson."
